SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Use the Data Kit to Install and Deploy Data Streams and Calculated Insights

The Einstein Personalization Data Kit contains bundles for installing the ingestion API and Salesforce CRM data streams. It also provides a bundle for installing two required calculated insights.

Install and Deploy the Einstein Personalization Ingestion API Data Stream
To configure the mapping for the personalization log DMO, install the Ingestion API data stream present in the Einstein Personalization data kit bundle. When you create a data stream from the data kit in your target org, the data model objects are available automatically.
Install and Deploy Einstein Personalization Salesforce CRM Data Streams
To configure the mapping for the four standard Einstein Personalization DMOs, install the Salesforce CRM data streams present in the Einstein Personalization data kit bundle. When you create the data streams from the data kit in your target org, the data model objects are available automatically.
Install and Deploy the Required Einstein Personalization Calculated Insights
To view the pipeline DMO metrics using the Personalization Intelligence app, two calculated insights are required. Install these required calculated insights from the Einstein Personalization data kit after installing the personalization data kit.
